00029 #ifndef _glfw3_native_h_
00030 #define _glfw3_native_h_
00031

00033 extern "C" {

00038  * Doxygen documentation

00079 /*************************************************************************
00080  * System headers and types
00081  *************************************************************************/
00082 
00083 #if defined(GLFW_EXPOSE_NATIVE_WIN32)
00084  // This is a workaround for the fact that glfw3.h needs to export APIENTRY (for
00085  // example to allow applications to correctly declare a GL_ARB_debug_output
00086  // callback) but windows.h assumes no one will define APIENTRY before it does
00087  #undef APIENTRY
00088  #include <windows.h>
00089 #elif defined(GLFW_EXPOSE_NATIVE_COCOA)
00090  #include <ApplicationServices/ApplicationServices.h>
00091  #if defined(__OBJC__)
00092   #import <Cocoa/Cocoa.h>
00093  #else
00094   typedef void* id;
00095  #endif
00096 #elif defined(GLFW_EXPOSE_NATIVE_X11)
00097  #include <X11/Xlib.h>
00098  #include <X11/extensions/Xrandr.h>
00099 #elif defined(GLFW_EXPOSE_NATIVE_WAYLAND)
00100  #include <wayland-client.h>
00101 #elif defined(GLFW_EXPOSE_NATIVE_MIR)
00102  #include <mir_toolkit/mir_client_library.h>
00103 #endif
00104 
00105 #if defined(GLFW_EXPOSE_NATIVE_WGL)
00106  /* WGL is declared by windows.h */
00107 #endif
00108 #if defined(GLFW_EXPOSE_NATIVE_NSGL)
00109  /* NSGL is declared by Cocoa.h */
00110 #endif
00111 #if defined(GLFW_EXPOSE_NATIVE_GLX)
00112  #include <GL/glx.h>
00113 #endif
00114 #if defined(GLFW_EXPOSE_NATIVE_EGL)
00115  #include <EGL/egl.h>
00116 #endif
00117
